Once an indexer has fully populated a search index, you might want subsequent indexerruns to incrementally index just the new and changed documents in your database.To enable incremental indexing, set the "dataChangeDetectionPolicy" property in yourdata source definition. This property tells the indexer which change tracking mechanismis used on your data.
